summary: Preset of my Skyrim/RP character. Nothing super fancy.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=6][center][u]Kayana RaceMenu Preset[/u][/center]
[/size][/font][/b]Just a simple preset for my character. I thought people might enjoy it despite the simpleness. I have never really been the one for major bling and blang for a character appearance. And hopefully you guys can enjoy this as much as I have. I do not expect everyone to like it, as I chose a more natural look then a glamorous one as commonly seen on the Nexus. I simply ask to keep negative comments to a minimum. This file will only work properly on human females (except Redguard).


[center]Required Mods:
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]SkyUI[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57538/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D57538%26preview%3D&pUp=1]BB's Hair Physics Project[/url][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57538/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D57538%26preview%3D&pUp=1]
[/url]

The hdt hair mod is optional if you prefer a different hair, or if you just hate hdt then I redirect you to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/?]Ponytail Hairstyles[/url]. Also strongly recommended but not required is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52322/?]WSCO - Windsong Skyrim Character Overhaul[/url] as the mod changes the faces and vanilla hairs too. I strongly recommend the Oriental version of whichever body mod you prefer. I cannot guarantee that any other mod that changes the face will make it look any better or even the same. 


[center]
How to install?[/center][center](I would hope most of you know how by now):

Manually install mod by placing in the Skyrim/Data Folder, the file is already mapped to go where it needs to.[/center]



I also intend to add other races into the mix if enough people are interested enough. I hope that those of you who were kind enough to try this preset out at least enjoy it a little. All recommended mods do not belong to me in any manner, and I strongly recommend that if you already use them, go endorse them. If there's anything important that I missed, I apologize, please let me know and I'll fix it right away.
author: Kayanakoe
